page.title: 13THE WELCOME CLUB
page.content: senior citizens assist the pupils in their project work. One member of the club has visited lessons to talk about life in Cranford during the Second World War; he has gone on many visits to museums and other places of interest , including India, with pupils and staff; and attends every school event. There are lots of activities for elderly people at the school. Several members of staff have, as part of their job, to work in the community. The Community Arts Teacher, organises festivals, theatre groups, ballets, art displays and runs a drama group as part of the Youth Club. The Community Liaison Teacher works in putting into practise the school's anti-racist policy and assists groups within the community to overcome their problems.
